title: Floral Diamond and Pearl Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Fancy Cut Pink Sapphires (NV Fancy - 27.06 carats)
and D PAN Diamonds(+7) - 3.62 carats. Expertly crafted with a durable build.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a modern floral design intricately handcrafted with cascading diamond-studded flowers, interspersed with lustrous pearls and vibrant pink sapphires. The floral motifs are meticulously detailed with pave settings to maximize sparkle and brilliance. The centerpiece features a grand floral medallion, culminating in a single, prominent pearl drop. Note the seamless integration of traditional necklace styles with contemporary floral aesthetics.
colors: Light Pink (Sapphires). A harmonious blend of soft and elegant hues.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its modern design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and formal events.
description: This haaram is a testament to superior craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of diamonds, pearls, and pink sapphires creates a mesmerizing effect. A blend of tradition and modernity making it a versatile piece. High-quality materials ensure enduring beauty and value. Make a statement and become a showstopper with this necklace!
